DIA_WolfSon_EVT_HeyYou_03_02: For an outsider, you look pretty strong. You can help me!
DIA_WolfSon_EVT_What_03_02: One guy really pissed me off! But I already know how I'm going to humiliate him!
DIA_WolfSon_EVT_What_03_03: I'll give him an axe he can't lift. You're of similar stature, so if you can't lift it, he probably can't either!
DIA_WolfSon_EVT_Trial_03_01: Holy shit! I was hoping you wouldn't! Well, now I have to come up with something new...
DIA_WolfSon_EVT_Trial_03_03: Take it! I don't need it anymore.
DIA_WolfSon_EVT_Trial_15_04: It flew out of my hands!
DIA_WolfSon_EVT_Trial_03_06: But now I'm sure it's a heavy enough axe.
